mapper.select: select gugun_code, gugun_name from gugun where sido_code = #{sidoCode}
select first_image, title, addr1, latitude, longitude from attraction_info where content_type_id = #{content_id} and sido_code = #{sido_code} and gugun_code = #{gugun_code} limit 10
SELECT content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, first_image, latitude, longitude FROM attraction_info WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') limit 50
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO route_detail (route_id, sequence, content_id, description) VALUES (#{routeId}, #{sequence}, #{contentId}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT r.route_id, r.user_id, r.is_shared, rd.sequence, rd.content_id, rd.description FROM ( SELECT route_id, user_id, is_shared FROM route WHERE is_shared = 1 ORDER BY route_id LIMIT ${start}, ${pageSize} ) r LEFT JOIN route_detail rd ON r.route_id = rd.route_id ORDER BY r.route_id, rd.sequence;
